settings.title: Configurações
settings.info_notification: Signatures are downloaded at hourly intervals. Changes to this page will take effect on next automatic signatures download.
settings.memory_warning: The system has less than 4GB of RAM. You're strongly advised to disable official ClamAV signatures to avoid memory filling.

dashboard.title: Antivírus
dashboard.error_getting_dashboard_data: Erro ao obter dados do painel

docs.official_signatures: Official ClamAV signatures use a large amount of memory. Official signatures detect many old threats but are not very effective against the latest malware.
docs.unofficial_signatures_ratings: Higher rating means more blocked threats but also a higher probability of false positives. Recommended ratings are 'Low' and 'Medium'.
